name: Coastguard Radar - Hunt
description:
COASTGUARD RADAR-HUNT

Take a seat in this dice-based strategy game to find smuggler-boats but be aware: If too many smugglers make it to the coast undetected you will loose your job.

The radar is your weapon but it's a bit cranky. Newest prototype. Can you squeeze out the last bit of luck to get the highest score?

GMTK GameJam 2022!

This game is a prototype with the idea taken out of Battleships. It can be more advanced and tweaked for more tactical as well as strategical gameplay. I still have ideas left that couldn't make it in the game, like:

  • Having a helicopter that needs to chase down marked smuggler boats
  • Having different supervisors that give you different upgrades and/or downgrades
  • Having your radar station being upgradeable with meaningful stuff (Powerful scans as example)

Gamedesign, programming and pixelart was all done by me, Narsiph.

Everything around the leaderboard is made by 'Silentwolf' and information(s) can be found on silentwolf.com.
